explain: to look in a fixed way with eyes wide open
a supply of money raised and kept for a certain purpose
the plant part where fruit and seeds come from
the part of a flower that grows around a seed
the part from which a new plant grows
the main stem of a tree
a shape with a round bottom and a pointed top
a large place where many people live and work together
a part of a fence or wall that can open and close to let people through
bigger than most other things of the same kind

chuckled

staring

repeated

fund

flower

fruit

seed

trunk

cone

city
The farmer opened the gate so the cows could walk into the field.
gate
The large dog could not fit through the small door.
large
